title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz

text: When outcomes don't motivate artificial intelligence efforts, how can they be successful? Find

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz

text: out how one chief data officer thinks about AI on today's episode.

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t12.6
text: I'm Jack Berkowitz from ADP and you're listening to me, myself and AI.

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz

text: Welcome to Me, Myself and AI, a podcast on artificial intelligence and business. Each

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz

text: episode we introduce you to someone innovating with AI. I'm Sam Ransbotham, professor of

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t29.4
text: analytics at Boston College. I'm also the AI and business strategy guest editor at MIT

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t35.36
text: Sloan Management Review. And I'm Shervin Khodobande, senior partner with BCG and I

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t40.8
text: co-lead BCG's AI practice in North America. Together, MIT, SMR and BCG have been researching

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t47.519999999999996
text: and publishing on AI for six years, interviewing hundreds of practitioners and surveying thousands

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t53.28
text: of companies on what it takes to build and to deploy and scale AI capabilities and really

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t58.6
text: transform the way organizations operate. Today, Shervin are excited to have Jack

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t65.24000000000001
text: Berkowitz, chief data officer of ADP. Jack, thanks for joining us. Welcome.

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t68.92
text: Thank you. Glad to be here. Let's get started. You're the chief data officer at ADP. Can you

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t74.48
text: tell us about what that role means? ADP, known as automatic data processing, is the world's

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t80.16
text: largest provider of HR services, payroll, taxes, things like that. We operate in 140 countries.

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t87.16000000000001
text: We have over 900,000 clients. Millions of people are getting paid from us every day. I sort of

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t93.48
text: have a two-sided job. On the one hand, I'm responsible for all of the data that flows

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t98.48
text: through our systems. We're a really big company. We have massive amounts of data. So all the

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t102.76
text: things are classically associated with chief data officers, things about data governance, data

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t107.76
text: security, usage of analytics. The other side of my job, and it's probably even a bigger job, is I

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz

text: build data products. And so my team builds people analytics, benchmarks, compensation information,

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t120.88
text: all that type of products that our clients are using to take decisions about the world of work

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t126.64
text: every day. I didn't hear the word artificial intelligence in there anywhere. How is that

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t131.64
text: involved? I also run that for the company as well. But we use machine learning throughout those

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t137.88
text: processes, whether we're cleaning the information, whether we're building embedded capabilities in

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz

text: our HR applications or our payroll applications, whether we're doing things like aligning job

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t149.04000000000002
text: titles. People would say, well, how hard can that be? You know, in any given month, we pay about 21

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t154.16000000000003
text: million people. We have about 14 million job titles. And we crunch that down to between six

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t159.92000000000002
text: and 8,000 job titles. So an awful lot of very sophisticated natural language processing and

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t166.12
text: machine learning to make that happen. It seems like there's three different roles that you

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t171.56
text: mentioned that all come together. And I say this because at many companies, there are literally

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t177.84
text: three different roles for what you mentioned for data governance, for data products, and for AI,

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t183.4

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t192.4
text: things have to work together. Comment a bit, please, on how it came about that it's one person

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t200.16
text: leading all three. That's my first question. And then my second question is, is the AI involvement

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t207.68

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t214.28
text: for the broader enterprise?

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t216.4
text: It's a really good question. The thing to know about ADP is, yes, we're a services company in the

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t222.12
text: sense that we provide, for example, payroll for about one in six or even more than that people in

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t228.6
text: the US. But we also are a SaaS product company. And because of that, there's a whole bunch of

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t235.4
text: different development organizations working on building SaaS products, whether it's for the small

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t241.44
text: businesses all the way up to the biggest companies in the world, using our applications to do HR or

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t246.95999999999998
text: recruiting or payroll or taxes, things like that. And because of that, this role emerged really

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t254.32
text: started as building data products. But to build data products and things like reporting, it grew

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t260.24
text: the data platforms. And off the data platforms, it grew more and more capabilities in terms of doing

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t265.8
text: machine learning, best practices. We got into the ethical use of data and the ethical use of machine

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t272.32
text: learning and AI. And that allowed us to be additive in terms of capabilities. The other thing about it

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t279.16
text: then is, okay, well, where's the extent? Because we have all of those SaaS applications, my teams

text: other development organizations to use the frameworks that we build. So we, for example, build

text: a whole bunch of machine learning operations capabilities, things about bias monitoring and data

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t301.8
text: shape monitoring, because that makes sense to be done once in a company and then allow other

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t307.12
text: people to take advantage of it. We've seen a massive growth in people identifying themselves as

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t312.32000000000005
text: data scientists over the past four years. We've been hiring people and everything else, but they

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t317.20000000000005
text: don't all have to learn how to do model deployment into production.

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t322.12
text: Very interesting. Is it fair to say that the introduction and maybe scaling of AI more broadly

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t328.6
text: outside of the data products that you do for your customers was sort of the data products themselves,

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t334.76
text: right? The incubation of these data products opened the eye of the organization.

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t339.08
text: Yeah, exactly. It was exactly that. It was this incubation. And then off the incubation, we started

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t345.59999999999997
text: to see areas of opportunity and areas of excitement. It wasn't really a top down push. It was very much

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz

text: a bottom up where teams were seeing what we were achieving. And then other teams would come to us

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t358.92
text: and say, hey, wait a second, we want to build a capability. Can you work with us? And so it's

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t363.6
text: really become an organic growth.

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t366.24
text: I really love this story. Often I get asked to talk to groups or interviews with media around chief

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t374.88
text: data officer roles. And there's a question around like, what's the right chief data officer role? And

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t379.56
text: I've always been saying that role has to be really, really linked to the use of data, not just to the

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t385.52000000000004
text: governance of data and to like building things with data. And I think you're a great example of

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t391.28
text: the right setup of that role and success with that role.

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t395.12
text: It's interesting because my career has all been about product development or outcomes. It's been

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t399.92
text: about making sure that you have business outcomes. Are you building something or people buying it or

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t404.52
text: you're building something and you're coming out with a better capability. We bring that product

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t410.0
text: mindset to even our data governance. Yes, we need to do governance, but it's not for regulatory

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz

text: compliance necessarily. It's really about making sure that we understand the information such that

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t422.28000000000003
text: somebody can build a good data product on top or a good machine learning capability on top. Otherwise,

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t427.48
text: why are we doing all this?

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t431.92

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t447.24
text: might find it interesting and helpful.

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t454.12
text: I graduated right at the time of a recession. Sound familiar? I spent about 10 years in engineering

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t474.12

text: environment.

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t516.92

text: internally focused?

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t532.4000000000001
text: We're in the HR space, so runs a wide range of capabilities. One of the things that we're doing

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t537.88

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t551.44

text: inside of a company, so that people can find new roles, things like that. We have a group that's

text: doing recommendations for people in retirement programs. We have a big retirement program for

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t583.88
text: And there's a capability that recommends to people to say, hey, people like you will actually

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t588.5200000000001
text: invest more or less in their retirement program. And so that's a machine learning based capability.

title: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz
id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t595.08
text: But then we also, just like any other company, use machine learning across the board in other areas.

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t600.0400000000001

text: for our clients. Our ability to create a better service environment for them

id: The Three Roles of the Chief Data Officer - ADP's Jack Berkowitz-t632.84
